title: Krishna Kumar Shrestha
text:
With an unwavering passion for data analysis, I have forged a path of success in leveraging insights from complex information. As a devoted advocate for harnessing the power of data, I constantly seek opportunities to explore its depths and uncover valuable patterns. My dedication to the field is evident through my active involvement in the Actuarial Society of Nepal, where I contribute to the growth and advancement of data-driven practices. Through continuous learning and staying at the forefront of industry developments, I strive to make meaningful contributions to the world of data analysis and drive innovation in this dynamic field.



School of Mathematical Science | Kathmandu,Nepal
B.Math Sc. major in Actuarial Science | 2017 -2021



Actuarial Society of Nepal | Secretary | 2022 - Present
Principle Risk Consulting |Consultant| June 2019 - Present
IME General Insurance |Senior Underwriter| June 2021 - Oct 2022
Numeric Mind | Data Analyst Intern | Jun 2020 -Jan 2021





R | Python | Excel with VBA



English | Nepali



Discriptive Analysis | Data Manupulation |Data Visualization | Predictive Modeling
